submission:
class Solution:
    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:
        horizontalCut.sort()
        verticalCut.sort()
        i = len(horizontalCut) - 1
        j = len(verticalCut) - 1
        p, q = 0, 0
        ans = 0
        while i >= 0 and j >= 0:
            if horizontalCut[i] >= verticalCut[j]:
                ans += (q + 1) * horizontalCut[i]
                i -= 1
                p += 1
            else:
                ans += (p + 1) * verticalCut[j]
                j -= 1
                q += 1
        while i >= 0:
            ans += (q + 1) * horizontalCut[i]
            i -= 1
        while j >= 0:
            ans += (p + 1) * verticalCut[j]
            j -= 1
        return ans
